title: Corrigendum to “Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus Outbreak in the Republic of Korea, 2015” [Volume 6, Issue 4, August 2015, 269–278]
body: The author decides to upload the data used for the journal, which was not allowed to be disclosed when it was published in PHRP 2015 August issue. Researchers have to mention the source when they use the data in publishing analysis in their research.
